TopicTitle: How many rep points to get second rep bar?

Articles.Content:
I saw how the amount of bars was calculated a long time, ago, now I am curious, since now my goal is to get at least 2 bars, I release a lot of quality craft, but often people forget to leave rep or I released them when giving reputation wasn't popular

Just want some inspiration to continue building and coming up with new ideas.

Edited April 27, 2014 by iDan122

If everyone how posts here gives IDan rep he will get that second chevron.

He deserves it!

MJ

I hate to be "That guy" (seriously, it sickens even me), but this is why I contested the reputation system when it was first introduced years ago (on another forum). These threads are generally in the wrong section and were numerous in some cases. The War Z forum (before the name change) comes to mind.

Rep should only really be given when a persons comment is notable in some way, maybe it is very helpful, or inspiring, or downright hilarious

Rep points for other reasons, like for people who just ask for them, or just to get a second bar devalue the whole reputation system.

It is just a number at the end of the day, and that number has only as much value as we ascribe to it, if that number goes up due to insightful comments then it "means" a whole lot more.

We used to have a specific rule against asking for rep, might have to bring that back, also I'm moving this to the Forum Forum as GD is no place for it.

Thanks guys, it's 98 points, only 2 to go
